description: Remote Control for GoPro Hero allows you to control your GoPro Hero 2, 3, 3+, or 4 camera using your Android Wear device.## Features:- Supports GoPro Hero 2 (with Wifi Backpack), Hero 3, 3+, and 4 cameras.- Power camera on/off.- Start/stop recording.- Change camera mode (video, photo, multi, burst, ...).- Show remaining pictures or video time.- Show battery state.## How does it work?The Android Wear device (such as a smartwatch) sends commands to the handheld (e.g. a smartphone or tablet) which is connected with the GoPro Hero camera.## More information and contact- http://www.mobwheel.com/gopro- http://www.camerasuite.org- YouTube demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxgIq0YDoho
descriptionHTML:
Remote Control for GoPro Hero allows you to control your GoPro Hero 2, 3, 3+, or 4 camera using your Android Wear device.

## Features:
- Supports GoPro Hero 2 (with Wifi Backpack), Hero 3, 3+, and 4 cameras.
- Power camera on/off.
- Start/stop recording.
- Change camera mode (video, photo, multi, burst, ...).
- Show remaining pictures or video time.
- Show battery state.


## How does it work?
The Android Wear device (such as a smartwatch) sends commands to the handheld (e.g. a smartphone or tablet) which is connected with the GoPro Hero camera.


## More information and contact
- http://www.mobwheel.com/gopro
- http://www.camerasuite.org
- YouTube demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxgIq0YDoho
comments: Works exactly as advertised, using Nexus 5, Moto 360 + GoPro Hero4 Black. Suggested features are support for ambient to save watch battery, option to remove some of the modes (eg. if you only wanted to switch between photo & video) and lastly potentially the ability to set up profiles to easily switch between video modes (4k 30fps -> 1080p 120fps with one touch)
Works as advertised on Sony SmartWatch 3 and is a cool extension to the goPro app on my phone. Can only recommend if you are Sony SW3 and GoPro owner.
5 star but... I hope it will support settings mode. It work fine though.
App does not appear on my SmartWatch 2, anyone have any ideas?
Not function on Gear S Can't use at my Gear S and can't refund too...
H4 session with Moto360 Only the record button works. Nothing else.
